ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Back on the topic of the dreaded EBW
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Was the vampire oracle in at the time?  It seems to have a larger aggro radius.  When I was level 42, I didn t have any problems pulling the two far
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 17 Apr 2000, Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> We had no problem with the maid / butler (4 spawns), hall (3 spawns),
> kitchen (3 spawns) and the 2 close gargoyles. When we tried to pull the 2
> far gargoyles, the buggy pathing would bite us in the ass and the negotiator
> room would come to investigate what all the ruckus was. (leading to a prompt
> evac)

Was the vampire oracle in at the time? It seems to have a
larger aggro radius. When I was level 42, I didn't have any
problems pulling the two far gargoyles without getting the
negotiator room except one time when the oracle was in.

That corner between the gargoyles and kitchen is safe too (out
of aggro radius) *except* when the vampire oracle walks by due
to a train.

> Would you have any tips on the harmoing of the gargs / negotiator / ball
> room ? We tried to break the ball room a couple of times, but to no avail.
> We all lined up in the south east corner of the room while invis, we let
> invis drop which would pull the 2 mobs at the doors. Problem was about
> halfway through the fight the gypsys would agro and jump on board. After 4
> attempts we called it a night.

There's a secret hall between the music room and negotiator
room. Most reports I've seen say to fight in there. I've
always pulled both rooms to the maid/butler and kitchen areas.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
